amendment.description: Amendment establishes a program to provide grants to States to combat violence against women and children and establishes various provisions to limit the effects of violence and sexual assault on women and children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide grants to states to combat violence against women and children and establish various provisions to limit the effects of violence and sexual assault.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
